descriptionHtml:
This adds two new followers to Honningbrew Meadery, they are married and very deeply in love. They are not custom voiced though that may happen in the

future as well as them having their own house (Oh yes, there is also currently a "house" in Whiterun that is inaccessible and seems to have opened a door to

the void.) but anyways, they are Haleth and Melkor from The Silmarillion. Melkor has an absurdly over powered warhammer called "Grond."  And their ship

name is Meleth, which is both their names combined and also happens to mean "love" in Sindarin. Coincidence? I think not. [s]Also I blame two specific people

who know exactly who they are for this and for how hopelessly i ship them.[/s] 


Installation: Simply use NMM or MO or extract the contents of the zip file to your skyrim data folder
author: kittykatanderson
